name: chaotically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a confused way with no order: Everyone spoke rapidly and chaotically as we were guided through the village. The floor of her office is heaped chaotically with books. See
chaotic
More examplesFewer examplesDrivers swerved chaotically through clouds of dust as they tried to get through the combat zone. They left so quickly and chaotically to avoid the fast-moving fire that they left everything behind.The chaotically busy port serves as a transit point.
